name: Park Hotels & Resorts Inc.
description: Park Hotels & Resorts Inc. is a leading publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the hospitality sector. Formed through the spin-off from Chesapeake Lodging Trust in 2017, the company is headquartered in Tysons, Virginia. Park Hotels & Resorts owns a diverse portfolio of high-quality hotels and resorts located in key urban and resort markets across the United States and internationally. With a commitment to operational excellence, the company manages a collection of properties primarily under premium brands including Hilton, Marriott, and Hyatt. Park Hotels & Resorts is dedicated to enhancing guest experiences and maximizing property performance through strategic renovations and operational improvements. The company's portfolio includes more than 60 hotels, totaling over 12,000 guest rooms, which cater to both leisure and business travelers. Park Hotels aims to capitalize on the growing demand for travel and tourism while maintaining a focus on sustainability and community engagement. As the hospitality industry continues to recover from the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, Park Hotels & Resorts is well-positioned to leverage its strong market presence and strategic partnerships to drive growth and deliver long-term value to its shareholders.
